ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the SQL Server database to connect to.

DbContextPooling.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the DbContext will be pooled or explicitly created every time it's requested.

MaxRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts. Set it to 0 to disable the retry mechanism.

HealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the DbContext health check is enabled or not.

Tracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is enabled or not.

Metrics.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry metrics are enabled or not.

Timeout.description: Gets or sets the time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
